ygData.subject: Re: Nybright Sisters and taking the lives of our fello w man
ygData.msgSnippet: Sashes aren t that great unless your a major roleplayer.  I found that think leather apron is better 8 ac 1 weight.  Then thick banded belt will rock even more
ygData.messageBody:
Sashes aren't that great unless your a major roleplayer. I found that think
leather apron is better 8 ac 1 weight. Then thick banded belt will rock
even more its like 6-10 ac and 15str! that will help with damage. So for
right now don't be bumming, its not the end of the world brother.


Bismatal Bumrusher 22nd monk of Cazic thule

From: Lombard.Mikhael <Mikhael_Lombard@...>
To: <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, September 13, 1999 2:04 PM
Subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] Nybright Sisters and taking the lives of our fello w
man


> From: "Lombard.Mikhael" <Mikhael_Lombard@...>
>
> man that sucks big time, then you can never get the sash...
>
> -----Original Message-----

> From: "Tim Perkins" <tperkins@...>

> The notes are NO DROP which means you cant give them to anyone or anything
> sorry
>
> Kizmet Bayashi
> Monk of the 38th
> Da'Kor Guild of E Marr
>
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Lombard.Mikhael <Mikhael_Lombard@...>
> To: <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
> Sent: Monday, September 13, 1999 10:04 AM

w
> man
>
>
> > From: "Lombard.Mikhael" <Mikhael_Lombard@...>
> >
> > Question I am 19th and I really want to start doing the monk sash
quests,
> > but I am a Qeynos monk, can I make a free port monk and give the scroll
to
> a
> > monster and then kill the monster with my Qeynos monk to get the scroll?
I
> > hope so, since there is no other way to get Faction with the Ashen
Order.
> > Plus where is a good place for a monk of 19th season to get that all
> > important 20th season as a solo and with a group? I was thinking High
> Hold,
> > but I don't know.
> >
> > Kaladiel Ironfist
> > 19th Season Monk
> > Brell Serilius
> >
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Scott Hueseman [mailto:shueseman@...]

> > >
> > >From: "John N. Mosqueda" <mosquito@...>
> > >
> > >It would be my hope that no monk
> > >among us would go so far as to take the life of a fellow human in
>order
> to
> >
> > >gain
> > >some modicum of advancement. >In Quellious' name,
> > >
> > >Manjushri
> > >Bearer of the yellow sash of the Ashen Order
> > >
> >
> > Interesting idea, brother Manjushri. To advance to the highest levels
of
> > accomplishment, without taking the life of a human or demihuman (elf,
> dwarf,
> >
> > halfling, gnome). Alas, I've already slain a fair number of pirates
and
> > bandits, but I wonder if I can abstain from doing so for the remainder
of
> my
> >
> > days? Truly a test worthy of a monk.
> >
> > Dornn, Level 17 Monk (Feign Death! Yeah, baby!), Brell Serilis,
currently
> > hunting Gargoyles in the Ocean of Tears.
